title: Enhancing Hospitality Practice Competencies: Design and Project-Based Software Engineering Curriculum

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Students design and implement software systems reflecting real industrial requirements at least three times.
Learners develop five or more system verification and test cases through PBL (Problem-Based Learning) activities.

Learners can submit a team-based system design document (max. 20 pages) in month 3 of a 6-month course, achieve an average score of ≥4/5 on the peer evaluation rubric (clarity, completeness, innovation), and present core content within 10 minutes at a showcase.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
